content.p: 10% MSc tuition fee discount for international alumni from the School of Mathematical Sciences For international alumni who hold or are expected to graduate with an undergraduate degree from the School of Mathematical Sciences who have studied at the UK campus. Eligible masters courses are: Financial and Computational Mathematics MSc, Gravity, Particles and Fields MSc, Statistics MSc and Statistics and Applied Probability MSc. This applies to 2025 entry applicants to any of our postgraduate taught programmes who meet all conditions associated with their offer of study. Offered by The School of Mathematical Sciences
